amendment.description: Amendment sought to appoint a neutral Ombudsman within the Department of Education to ensure K-12 textbooks are held to high academic standards.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 6 printed in Part B of House Report 114-29 to appoint a neutral Ombudsman within the Department of Education to ensure K-12 textbooks are held to high academic standards.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Castro (TX) amendment (A006) Failed by recorded vote: 182 - 243 (Roll no. 97).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Castro (TX) amendment (A006) Failed by recorded vote: 182 - 243 (Roll no. 97).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A006) offered by Mr. Castro (TX).
